website_summaries.verdict: A functional and low-priced dual charger with LED indicator lights.
pros: This straightforward 2-controller dock is a great purchase that is cheaper than many micro USB charging cables
The LEDs change from red to green when each controller is charged
Includes an auto shutoff feature to stop charging controllers when they're full
This station charges controllers in 2.5 to 3 hours
cons: A few customers received stations with swapped LED indicators
Getting the right fit for controllers can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to plug in controllers, charges them fine, doesn't take up too much room on TV stand. We've only had about a month but still works. Even if it ends up breaking for the price I will probably end up buying another. Not sure what else there is to say! The only confusing thing about this product is the lights on the front are 'backwards': when you plug in the back controller, the light on the panel that lights up is the bottom one...I find this odd, but no reason not to buy the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi J.

customer_reviews.title: Handy but be warned
customer_reviews.text: The standard micro sub on the ps4 controller is awful. This device makes it way easier to charge your controller and pretty much acts like a stand when not in use. HOWEVER, because the charger plugs into the headphone I feel like it has caused very minor damage to my controller. Because you will always be charging your controller it will wear out your headphone jack and if you use wired headsets like me the connection with your headphones will probably be loose. In the end it's a great buy and if you use wireless headsets anyway it's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas smith

customer_reviews.title: Compact and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a PS4 and 4 controllers for a Christmas present for our kids. I had no idea it only came with a USB cord to charge one controller, and the additional controllers didn't come with charging cords. We hopped on Amazon and purchased this and it's perfect! Compact design and fits easily behind the TV and out of the way. It charges the remotes fast and gives you a green light indicator when they're ready.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Controllers fit PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD: Easy to set up, Low profile. The charger uses the ports on the bottom of the controller to charge and the controllers fit in the charging slot very snug. No chance of the controller falling out or not charging. Uses USB to charge so if you are like me and only puts their PS4 to sleep, you can just plug it into the front of the PS4 and it will always be charged! THE BAD: Nothing. It charges. End of story haha OVERALL: GREAT buy for a PS4 owner. Great price. Works perfectly, completely as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mac

customer_reviews.title: Defective charger port.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a five star if the back charger port worked right. I have to push the controller in hard for it to charge and the tiniest vibration stops the charge. That same controller can be slid into first port and charge no problem. I can stomp. Shake the table. Even tap on controller and front port charges fine. . I tried three controllers and all three would only charge if I pressed them down hard on back port. Don't want to screw up charger port and no need for the dock if I can only charge one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: C.Howsare

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't really ask for more
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, I had another charger but it used the micro USB connectors and it was always a chore trying to line up the connector. This one is a much more straight forward connector and it uses a little post the inserts into the headphone jack to further help alignment. I like that there is an indicator showing when the controller is charging vs charged. For the price I couldn't really ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Spotty.
customer_reviews.text: The cable or port only works when it’s at an angle so it’s likely there is a bad connection. Also, it doesn’t seem to charge when the ps4 is on standby, only when it’s running. Also, the charging symbols are wildly ineffective at showing which controller(s) are connected or charging. Sometimes they’re red when the controller is connected. Sometimes they’re green. Neither is apparently a sure sign of charging, because often I pull the controller off after many hours of being connected, and it’s still dead.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!

It seems to only charge the controller when needed. If i play for a short time the controller still shows as charged when I'm done. I feel like the charging indicator LEDs were in the wrong order. Like the front LED was for the rear controller but i don't have it in front of me to verify. Either way, the amber LED on the controller itself is on while charging.
